${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:MonochromeHairband.NAME: Monochrome Hairband
${modID}:MonochromeHairband.FLAVOR: A black and white hairband symbolizing her will: an endless pursuit and desire for music.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, add a #yDesire

${modID}:TheThirdMovement.NAME: The Third Movement
${modID}:TheThirdMovement.FLAVOR: The music reaches its climax, and the story comes to an end.
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #b3 #yMoonlight #ySonata cards you play deal #b3 times damage.

${modID}:ColorfulNotebook.NAME: Colorful Notebook
${modID}:ColorfulNotebook.FLAVOR: A colorful notebook adorned with various pictures of animals and plants.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b1 #yDazzling.

${modID}:CuteAnimalBandAid.NAME: Cute Animal Band-Aid
${modID}:CuteAnimalBandAid.FLAVOR: A brightly colored band-aid printed with various cute animal patterns.

${modID}:FountainDrink.NAME: Vending Machine Drinks
${modID}:FountainDrink.FLAVOR: A drink comes out when you press the button,  it's truly amazing!
DESCRIPTIONS: When using a potion, heal #b2 HP.

${modID}:Maracas.NAME: Maracas
${modID}:Maracas.FLAVOR: A mystical tool that could make even a wooden doll smile.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b1 #yHype.
